AGON.title: AGON Game System
AGON.domain-d10-advance: Advance a d8 Domain die to d10
AGON.domain-d8-advance-1: Advance a d6 Domain die to d8
AGON.domain-d8-advance-2: Advance a d6 Domain die to d8
AGON.epithet-d8-advance: Advance your Epithet die to d8
AGON.bolster-bonus: When you support or bolster, the die you give counts as one size larger.
AGON.pathos-bonus: When you mark Pathos for an extra Domain, take two extra dice instead of one.
AGON.favor-bonus: When you spend Divine Favor, roll +2d4 and keep the highest.
